name: WRI (2011). Greenhouse Gas (GHG Protocol: Product Life Cycle Accounting and Reporting Standard.
description:
The GHG Protocol Product Life Cycle Accounting and Reporting Standard, is signed to promote best practice GHG accounting and reporting. It has been
developed through an inclusive multi-stakeholder process involving experts from businesses, nongovernmental organizations (NGOs), governments,
and others convened by the World Resources Institute (WRI) and the World Business Council for
Sustainable Development (WBCSD).
